Plot: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.
Title: The Dreamers
Writer: Gilbert Adair (screenplay), Gilbert Adair (based on the novel)
Actors: Michael Pitt, Eva Green, Louis Garrel, Anna Chancellor
tomatoConsensus: Though lushly atmospheric, The Dreamers doesn't engage or provoke as much as it should.
